resources.string:
Version 1.2.1:
 --------------
 - Added The Trollfens monsters.
 - Corrected a minor error in the Gobling Witcher abilities.
 - Spanish only: Official names for Labyrinth of Ruin monsters and abilities.
 
 Version 1.1.0:
 --------------
 - The app icon now changes depending on the system language.
 - Click on act I or II monsters to see a description of their abilities.
 
 Version 1.0.0:
 --------------
 - All released expansions included.
 - Trait and attack type filtering.
 - Enable/Disable expansions via settings.
 - App in English/Spanish.
 - Complete monster stats.

\tIn most of the encounters, the overlord may add a group of monsters belonging to one of the encounter traits. However, filtering monsters from the monster deck is a tedious task. \n\tThe goal of this app is to make that filtering process quick and easy, helping in the selection of the monster group that fits your needs.
